alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Tammany Parish, Hancock and southern Pearl River Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Picayune, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Diamondhead, Mcneil, Kiln and Stennis Space Center. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 4 and 15. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 7 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
